title: External Partition Values in the File Path
sql:
-- Loads object storage data partitioned using folders
-- example: ..../state=CA/zipcode=94065/sales.csv
CREATE TABLE sales (
  state VARCHAR2(2),
  zipcode NUMBER(5), ... )
ORGANIZATION EXTERNAL (
  TYPE ORACLE_LOADER DEFAULT DIRECTORY DATA_PUMP_DIR
  ACCESS PARAMETERS (
    RECORDS IGNORE_HEADER=0 DELIMITED BY '\n'
    filename_columns="['state','zipcode']"
    file_uri_list="https://swiftobjectstorage.us-ashburn-1.oraclecloud.com/v1/.../sales/*.csv"
    credential_schema="MYSCHEMA"
    credential_name=mycredential
    FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' CSV WITHOUT EMBEDDED NOTRIM
  )
  LOCATION (
    'https://swiftobjectstorage.us-ashburn-1.oraclecloud.com/v1/.../sales/xxx/*.csv'
  )
  ...;
